mapper.select: SELECT w.fid fid, max(w.fIP) fIP, max(w.fmodel) model, max(fstatus_id) fstatus_id, max(i.fid) iid, max(ftype_id) ftype_id, wm_concat(g.fid) fmacurl, fequipment_no, wm_concat(fgather_no) fgather_no, max(fjoin_time) fjoin_time, max(i.fname) iname, max(dic.fvaluename) mname, max(fisnetworking) fisnetworking, max(fposition) fposition, max(d.fvaluename) statusname, max(di.fvaluename) typename FROM tb_welding_machine w LEFT JOIN tb_insframework i ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid = i.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf ON insf.fid = ins.fparent INNER JOIN tb_dictionary dic ON dic.fvalue = w.fmanufacturer_id INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d ON d.fvalue = w.fstatus_id INNER JOIN tb_dictionary di ON di.fvalue = w.ftype_id left JOIN tb_gather g ON g.FMACHINE_ID = w.fid where (d.ftypeid = 3 and di.ftypeid = 4 and dic.ftypeid = 14) GROUP BY w.FID, fequipment_no ORDER BY w.fid
